entry.title: GitHub Importer Maintenance
entry.content:
Nov 4, 04:01 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 4, 03:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 27, 17:00 UTC
Scheduled - GitHub Importer—namely the “Import repository” (https://github.com/new/import) UI on GitHub.com and the "Source Imports" (https://docs.github.com/en/rest/migrations/source-imports) REST API—will be undergoing scheduled maintenance. During this time, no new source imports will be processed. You will not be able to start new source imports until the end of the maintenance window.

entry.title: GitHub Importer Maintenance
entry.content:
Oct 27, 16:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 27, 15:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 20, 16:54 UTC
Scheduled - GitHub Importer—namely the “Import repository” (https://github.com/new/import) UI on GitHub.com and the "Source Imports" (https://docs.github.com/en/rest/migrations/source-imports) REST API—will be undergoing scheduled maintenance. During this time, no new source imports will be processed. You will not be able to start new source imports until the end of the maintenance window.

entry.title: Incident with Codespaces and Issues
entry.content:
Oct 26, 04:34 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Update - Codespaces is now experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Oct 26, 04:00 UTC
Update - Codespaces is still experiencing degraded availability in US East. To change regions: https://docs.github.com/en/codespaces/customizing-your-codespace/setting-your-default-region-for-github-codespaces

Oct 26, 03:13 UTC
Update - Codespaces is still experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Oct 26, 02:34 UTC
Update - Codespaces is now experiencing degraded availability. We are continuing to investigate.

Oct 26, 02:33 UTC
Update - Issues is operating normally.

Oct 26, 02:33 UTC
Update - We have resolved Issues performance, and are continuing to investigate degraded performance for Codespaces in US East.

Oct 26, 01:55 UTC
Update - We are investigating Codespace degraded performance in US East. To change region
https://docs.github.com/en/codespaces/customizing-your-codespace/setting-your-default-region-for-github-codespaces

Oct 26, 01:25 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate reports of issues with service(s): Issues, Codespaces. We will continue to keep users updated on progress towards mitigation.

Oct 26, 00:52 UTC
Update - Codespaces is experiencing degraded performance. We are still investigating and will provide an update when we have one.

Oct 26, 00:47 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Issues.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Oct 18, 16:16 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 18, 16:05 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing capacity constraints with hosted ubuntu-22, leading to high wait times. Other hosted labels and self-hosted runners are not impacted. We are actively working on mitigations.

Oct 18, 15:53 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Oct 6, 11:40 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 6, 11:22 UTC
Update - We identified an issue with the checkout action download which was causing elevated actions failures. We have performed some mitigations and are continuing investigation.

Oct 6, 10:48 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Actions.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Oct 5, 17:41 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 5, 17:24 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate this issue.

Oct 5, 17:03 UTC
Update - We are seeing recovery in Actions and will update status when all runs are no longer delayed.

Oct 5, 16:32 UTC
Update - Webhooks is operating normally.

Oct 5, 16:12 UTC
Update - We continue to see recovery and have added capacity to speed recovery time. We still expect to see slower than normal Actions job runs and webhook deliveries.

Oct 5, 15:04 UTC
Update - Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Oct 5, 15:02 UTC
Update - We are continuing to monitor webhook deliveries following our earlier mitigation. Next update in 20 minutes.

Oct 5, 14:46 UTC
Update - We found an issue that impacts some of customers related to webhook delivery. We have implemented a mitigation and are monitoring for impact. Next update in 15 minutes.

Oct 5, 14:08 UTC
Update - Codespaces is operating normally.

Oct 5, 13:59 UTC
Update - We identified reports of Codespaces not creating/resuming successfully in eu-west region at 1230 UTC. We mitigated this issue and have seen recovery since 1315 UTC. Next update in 15 mins.

Oct 5, 13:32 UTC
Update - Webhooks is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Oct 5, 13:19 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded performance for Codespaces.

entry.title: Incident with Actions
entry.content:
Oct 5, 07:01 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved.

Oct 5, 06:30 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating reports of degraded availability for Actions.
